text: Mehdi Abdi Ghara (; (born 30 November 1998) is an Iranian professional footballer. He currently plays for Persepolis in the Persian Gulf Pro League ==References== * Iran Football Pro League: Esteghlal 0-1 Persepolis * the- afc.com news ==Other websites== * Mehdi Abdi at Persian League Category:Persepolis F.C. players Category:1998 births Category:Association football forwards Category:Living people Category:Azadegan League players Category:Persian Gulf Pro League players
title: Mehdi Abdi
